document.full_text: media giant news corp aims to build its own social-gaming business as valuations of games companies, such as farmville maker zynga skyrocket, its head of digital media said on wednesday.
document.title: news corp aims to build own social gaming business
lines_and_colors: media giant news corp aims to build its own social-gaming business as valuations of games companies, such as farmville maker zynga skyrocket, its head of digital media said on wednesday.
